metadata.Title: CVE-2022-33879 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: The initial fixes in CVE-2022-30126 and CVE-2022-30973 for regexes in theStandardsExtractingContentHandler were insufficient, and we found aseparate, new regex DoS in a different regex in theStandardsExtractingContentHandler. These are now fixed in 1.28.4 and 2.4.1.

criterions.comment: tika package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
